parameters.name: InstanceIds
parameters.description: The ID of the Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instance. The value can be a JSON array that consists of up to 100 instance IDs. Separate the instance IDs with commas (,).

parameters.name: MaxResults
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: The token that is used to retrieve the next page of results.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the region in which the instance whose patches you want to query resides.
